parameters.query:
=WITH value_rows AS (
  SELECT * FROM json_to_recordset($1::json) AS x(
    recorded_at TEXT,
    date TEXT,
    area TEXT,
    temperature_c NUMERIC,
    humidity_pct NUMERIC
  )
)
INSERT INTO home.environment_log (recorded_at, date, area, temperature_c, humidity_pct)
SELECT 
  recorded_at::TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE,
  date::DATE,
  area,
  temperature_c,
  humidity_pct
FROM value_rows
ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING
RETURNING id, area, temperature_c;
